title: Trading Times (request)
description: Receive a list of market opening times for a given date.

trading_times.description: Date to receive market opening times for. (`yyyy-mm-dd` format. `today` can also be specified).

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
